features: Durable Construction: Serve soups, pasta, desserts, and more food in confidence. Our plastic serving utensils set is crafted from thick BPA-free plastic, ensuring that our party utensils resist any bending, breaking, or snapping under pressure.

Sleek Style: Elevate any occasion with our glossy clear buffet serving utensils that compliment a range of celebrations like weddings, birthday parties, barbecues, and more. The smooth handles also contribute to a comfortable and ergonomic grip.

Complete Set: Take the hassle out of hosting with our comprehensive serving utensils set for parties. This inclusive set features plastic serving spoons with deep bowls, break-resistant three-prong forks, and plastic serving tongs.

Reusable & Disposable: Our disposable serving utensils are designed to be both reusable and disposable. The utensils can be easily hand-washed for reuse at your next gathering, or simply toss in the trash for a hassle-free cleanup.
Great Value Pack: Our plastic catering set includes 6 disposable serving spoons (9.5"L x 2.5"W), 6 disposable forks (9.75"L x 2.5"W), and 6 disposable tongs (6.5"L x 2.5"W).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Serve in Style Enjoy stress-free hosting with our versatile plastic serving utensils set! Crafted from thick BPA-free plastic, serve soups, pasta, desserts, and more in confidence. The glossy finish of our buffet utensils elevates any occasion, be it weddings, birthday parties, barbecues, and beyond! Whether you opt for reuse by hand-washing or choose the convenience of disposal, our utensils cater to both preferences, offering a seamless and stylish solution for all your hosting needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: I was concerned that this set of "disposable" serving utensils would be cheap looking, badly performing, or too small. Fortunately, none of these concerns are true. The set includes six each of serving spoons, serving forks, and tongs. The sizes are decent and the plastic is thick and sturdy. They're marketed as disposable, but they are certainly reusable a number of times.The black gloss/matte finish looks good on the serving tray.The tongs are perhaps the least of the set, as they're a bit more flimsy than the other utensils and the teeth align with each other rather than mesh together. As a result, it might be a little tricky to pick up thin things like a leaf of lettuce, but they're perfectly good for picking up chunkier things like fruits and vegetables.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoy cooking for people so having serving utensils are a must! The spoons and the forks are nice but the tongs could be better. Tongs are smaller than I expected so it’s good size to grab small appetizers, cookies and finger foods but not idea to grab meats, or noodles dishes. I know these are disposable but the material is good quality so that you can wash it and reuse them, I definitely have! I took one star off because of the tongs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Serving Utensils
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these utensils because we are constantly hosting parties - especially during the holidays - and too often we run out of utensils. This is a great pack with everything I need for hosting our get-togethers. They are sturdy so I was able to wash and reuse them - but I like that they are disposable as well. The description does a good job setting the expectation for size, etc... I would recommend these utensils to friends/family and anyone who is hosting an event.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solves the Issue of Not Enough Serving Utensils
reviews.reviewText: This is good to have on hand if you entertain often. We never have enough serving utensils for our self-serve functions. The tongs, spoons, and forks are strong enough to wash and reuse if desired. They do not take up a lot of room either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These utensils arrived with my New Year's resolution: more hosting!
reviews.reviewText: When I ordered these, I was thinking about how we need more serving utensils to be able to have a large number of people over. We have some stainless steel ones, but I wanted some durable plastic ones for kid-based parties that leave a lot to wash afterwards. I can hit the "easy button" with these utensils. They look really nice for being plastic and can work well for various kinds of events. They have a durable feel to them. I definitely recommend them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Spoons, Okay Tongs
reviews.reviewText: The spoons/sporks are definitely the star of this set. They are very sturdy and perfect for serving all types of dishes. The tongs are...okay. They would work really well for a veggie tray, cheese tray, and that sort of dish. They aren't very large or strong, so may not work well for everything, especially larger or heavier things. However, I think they more than match the value of this set. At my time of acquisition, each item is about 67 cents, so they are more than worth that and do their job. I would get this set again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great serving utensils, really sturdy...
reviews.reviewText: I got these serving utensils to use on New Years and they helped out so much. These utensils are really sturdy and made of great quality. I was able to serve all my guest without having to dirty any dishes or need additional serving tools as this is such a complete set with most of the serving tools you need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pros and Cons.
reviews.reviewText: This set of disposable serveware contains an adequate amount of spoons, forks, and tongs. That's a plus.The quality is mediocre, but it is also the same as other disposable serveware sets. So, it's not better or worse than others I've used previously. That too is a plus.The forks and spoons are a bit more sturdy than are the tongs - which are crap. The tongs are flimsy and don't work very well to pick up lunchmeat or pickles, as the grip isn't great and they don't close except with a bit of force.They may work better for salad or lettuce, but I didn't try that out because I didn't put any out this year for Christmas lunch.The spoons and forks seemed to work somewhat well for casserole, provisionally that the spoon was not overloaded. I was unsure if the spoon would crack under pressure so it was decided to forego its use and simply use a cooking spatula for the casserole. The spoons/forks may be better suited for lighter foods - like pasta and fruit salads.I don't love these, but I don't hate them either. As mentioned, their quality is about the same as most disposable serveware sets. I plan to reuse them for future get-together events so I gave this product three stars.
